feed.title: 君子忧道亦忧贫
feed.subtitle: 强本而节用，则天不能贫。

entry.title: Hexo Problems
entry.content:
if you deploy hexo
some questions appear
you can search you hexo root directory(ls -a) for .git / .deploy_git delete them
and then sudo hexo d -g again . just like restart for computer .

memorandum cluase for myself ./start.sh . ./path.sh ./edit.sh ./rmarticle.sh
